Title: Re-sizing the Situation
Description:
The Re-Sizer v9.0.1 barely works on inanimate objects. I have no idea what it will do to organic matter!

But if we do nothing, Henry will die!

Desperate times call for massively experimental science, $n.

Take the Re-Sizer v9.0.1. I'll follow you around and calibrate it.

We're going to whip up a giant boar!
ObjectivesText: Use the Re-Sizer v9.0.1 on 3 Wandering Boars.
RewardText:
I never thought I'd be so relieved to be face to face with a giant, scientifically enhanced boar.

Let's go save my son.

Objectives.Text: Re-Sizer v9.0.1 tested on Wandering Boars
